fields.name: AdxDatabaseName
fields.description: The name of the Azure Data Explorer database.

fields.name: AdxEndpointUri
fields.description: The URI of the Azure Data Explorer endpoint.

fields.name: AdxRelationshipLifecycleEventsTableName
fields.description: The name of the Azure Data Explorer table used for recording relationship lifecycle events. The table will not be created if this property is left unspecified.

fields.name: AdxResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Azure Data Explorer cluster.

fields.name: AdxTableName
fields.description: The name of the Azure Data Explorer table used for storing updates to properties of twins and relationships. Defaults to AdtPropertyEvents.

fields.name: AdxTwinLifecycleEventsTableName
fields.description: The name of the Azure Data Explorer table used for recording twin lifecycle events. The table will not be created if this property is left unspecified.

fields.name: EventHubConsumerGroup
fields.description: The EventHub consumer group to use when ADX reads from EventHub. Defaults to $Default.

fields.name: EventHubEndpointUri
fields.description: The URL of the EventHub namespace for identity-based authentication. It must include the protocol sb://

fields.name: EventHubEntityPath
fields.description: The EventHub name in the EventHub namespace for identity-based authentication.

fields.name: EventHubNamespaceResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the EventHub namespace.

fields.name: RecordPropertyAndItemRemovals
fields.description: Specifies whether or not to record twin / relationship property and item removals, including removals of indexed or keyed values (such as map entries, array elements, etc.). This feature is de-activated unless explicitly set to 'true'. Setting this property to 'true' will generate an additional column in the property events table in ADX.
